overview: Based on the book, The Illustrated Protocols of Zion. The original Protocols of Zion have been read by countless millions of people over the last 117 years. This movie takes the basic assertions of the protocols and proves them in the present time. It is a brand new edition of the classic work which takes the “old” Protocols of Zion and shows, using present-day practical examples, its prescience and astonishing accuracy—despite being more than century old.
title: The Illustrated Protocols Of Zion
